seniority_level.evidence: Title includes 'Senior' and 8+ years of experience required

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as Cupertino, CA with no remote work language

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work‑authorization restrictions are provided

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type (W2, C2C, 1099) is not specified
